statusLine.command: input=$(cat); current_dir=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir'); model_name=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.model.display_name'); current_file=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_file // empty' | xargs basename 2>/dev/null || echo ''); cd "$current_dir" 2>/dev/null || exit; git_branch=$(git branch --show-current 2>/dev/null || echo ''); git_info=''; if [ -n "$git_branch" ]; then modified=$(git status --porcelain 2>/dev/null | wc -l | tr -d ' '); additions=$(git diff --numstat 2>/dev/null | awk '{sum += $1} END {print sum+0}'); deletions=$(git diff --numstat 2>/dev/null | awk '{sum += $2} END {print sum+0}'); if [ "$additions" != '0' ] || [ "$deletions" != '0' ]; then git_info=" $(tput setaf 3)$modified files, $additions (+), $deletions (-)$(tput sgr0)"; elif [ "$modified" != '0' ]; then git_info=" $(tput setaf 3)$modified files changed$(tput sgr0)"; fi; fi; printf "$(tput bold)%s$(tput sgr0) $(tput setaf 6)git$(tput sgr0):$(tput setaf 2)(%s)$(tput sgr0)%s%s â”‚ $(tput setaf 5)%s$(tput sgr0)" "$(basename "$current_dir")" "$git_branch" "$git_info" "$([ -n "$current_file" ] && printf " @ %s" "$current_file" || echo '')" "$(echo "$model_name" | sed 's/Claude //')"
